title: Watch: People are witnessing thunder snow across New England
text:
The nor‚Äôeaster battering New England Thursday has wrought a rare phenomenon: thunder snow .
As the storm swept across the region, people posted videos that captured the rumbling snowfall ‚Äî and sometimes their startled reactions ‚Äî online.
‚ÄúIt shouldn‚Äôt surprise you if you hear thunder and see some lightning during the storm,‚Äù Boston.com meteorologist Dave Epstein said of Thursday‚Äôs storm . ‚ÄúIf this is the case, you are experiencing thunder snow ‚Äî and some of the most intense snowfall rates we‚Äôll see.‚Äù
According to Epstein, the heaviest snow Thursday will occur from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. with some areas seeing a foot or more of accumulation.
While none of these reactions can top The Weather Channel‚Äôs Jim Cantore‚Äôs thunder snow excitement in 2015 , it‚Äôs still getting a lot of love from New Englanders.
We just had Thunder Snow here at the NWS Office in Taunton.
